actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Weather Modification Policy Act of 1976 to extend the date for the submission of the report of the Secretary of Commerce on weather modification.

summary.text: Amends the National Weather Modification Policy Act of 1976 to extend to June 13, 1978, the date for submission of the report of the Secretary of Commerce on weather modification.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Weather Modification Policy Act of 1976 to extend the date for the submission of the report of the Secretary of Commerce on weather modification.
